column2: First Trust MLP and Energy Income Fund

First Trust MLP and Energy Income Fund is a non-diversified, closed-end management investment company. The Fund's investment objective is to seek a high level of total return with an emphasis on current distributions paid to common shareholders. It seeks to provide its shareholders with a vehicle to invest in a portfolio of cash generating securities of energy companies. The Fund, under normal market conditions, invests approximately 85% of its managed assets in equity and debt securities of master limited partnerships (MLPs), MLP-related entities, and other energy sector and energy utilities companies. It invests in various sectors, such as chemicals, gas utilities, electric utilities, multi-utilities, and oil, gas and consumable fuels. Its investment advisor is First Trust Advisors L.P.
